website_summaries.verdict: A wine storage cabinet and rack that offers extra organization and space for other items.
pros: Top shelves are large enough for larger items
Utilizes its height for extra storage
cons: Bottle storage requires people to bend over to access

customer_reviews.title: Great finish, but very difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bar ladder but extremely difficult to install (this is why I have a 4 star). The instructions aren’t very “user friendly”...it’s basically just diagrams of parts and labels. A well detailed “instructions to install” would be great for future buyers. Don’t get me wrong, the outcome is worth it! It’s still an awesome product. Mine fit quite well in my dining area :)
customer_reviews.author: LéilaF

customer_reviews.title: Looks Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely true what everyone says... instructions are terrible, but I built if myself within 5 hours. Looks amazing for the price paid. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Too much! Low quality.
customer_reviews.text: The upper part of the unit is somewhat flimsy. The stickers they use to cover the cam lock screws are noticeable as well as peeling up. The directions on building this unit are not detailed enough. Took me at least and hour and half to build it completely. The black pegs they use to hold the wine rack did not even come in complete black color. There was damage on the surface of the unit. See photo. The price of this unit is way to much for the quality it is.
customer_reviews.author: bratja

customer_reviews.title: ... house warming gift for my brother to showcase his fine liquor collection
customer_reviews.text: got this as a house warming gift for my brother to showcase his fine liquor collection. Although the item looks larger in picture it was not as big in person. All of the bottles fit and the wine glasses fit nicely on the bottom. Warning did take around 2 hours to assemble even with reading the instructions. The color was perfect and matched the remaining dining room furniture nicely. he received many compliments and everyone thought it was way more expensive than it was. Would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy K.

customer_reviews.title: very painful to set up- it took me 4hrs to build
customer_reviews.text: very painful to set up- it took me 4hrs to build, not the best quality & the worst part- the base of my wine glasses don't fit in the metal racks, the opening is too narrow ;( all that for nothing
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Coleman

customer_reviews.title: The dark color matches the Ikea dark brown shade very nicely. Instructions are not the best
customer_reviews.text: The bar fit perfectly in our apt. The dark color matches the Ikea dark brown shade very nicely. Instructions are not the best, but each piece is numbered on the edge in red so you can figure out which piece is needed for each step. Figuring out which way to face was a little bit trickier, but I was still able to put the bar together by myself while my boyfriend watched. I forgot to use glue on the wooden pieces, and remembered on the last few ones for the wine rack rack, but it hasn't faltered yet. Would definitely recommend this for those who are in a tight space and want to utilize space efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy N

customer_reviews.title: Good Value For The Price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a bar but it needed to be the right size and fit in a small space so this was perfect. The reviews regarding the assembly instructions are pretty accurate - it took about 3 1/2 hours. The pieces are all marked with letters and you have to use some common sense in spots as the instructions arent always clear but it's not as bad as some people were making it out to be. I use the top shelf for liquor bottles - they're too tall to fit on the middle shelves. Overall, it fits my needs and matches my furniture and I'm pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: MJG825

customer_reviews.title: It's a decent little bar shelf.
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf. The directions were difficult to read and did compare to IKEA building directions, but it wasn't too hard to figure it out. We got it build in a couple of hours. The quality is decent and it works well in the space we needed to have it. The wine glass racks DO NOT hold any of our wine glasses. They are only big enough for the base of champagne glasses, but we just used it as a shelf for our glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Miller

customer_reviews.title: Chipped Surface Egde
customer_reviews.text: At first glance, the bar looks nice. When I was halfway through assembly, I noticed a couple of the edges of the shelves had chipping. Since I already had it unpacked and was a good amount into the build, I decided to finish, hoping the damaged areas would not be visible. Unfortunately, the chipping is in the most visible areas of the furniture. Would have been an okay product, but between the damage and minimal space...I wish I'd picked something else!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this. My brother bought one for his house, so did a few of his friends and I plan on buying another when I move out of the country. Everyone I know loves the style. My sister can't wait to get mine when I move. It's tricky to put together but worth every penny. I it's not too big and fits well I'm my living room and is heavy enough it won't fall over.
customer_reviews.author: Nice product

customer_reviews.title: No directions, just microscopic graphics!
customer_reviews.text: I happen to like putting things together. This has got to be the worst product I have ever put together. There were no per se directions there were just graphics that were so minuscule that it was very difficult to piece this together. The pre drilled holes for one shelf piece were actually on the wrong side of the board. The camlock connectors do not fit properly and fall out. I’m afraid that in the near future I may have to do some reinforcing. The one and only positive thing I have to say is that it looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet but......
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet arrived quickly but came without instructions. Was able to locate assembly instructions online but lack proper guidance to assemble the unit. There are no "written" guidelines, only drawings. This cabinet took me almost 3 hours to assemble, and I have a good mechanical / DYI / construction background. Do not order if you are NOT mechanically inclined. Once built, this unit is as described. Nice unit overall and functions well.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase -- but take your time with assembly
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this -- it's great for a small space. The item arrived fast and is as pictured and described. It does take time to assemble -- and one has to review the parts and diagrams carefully -- but I took my time and reviewed the documents carefully. It's pretty solid. Some of my stemware won't fit on the tracks -- the bases are too big. Also, my liquor bottles are too tall to fit on the shelves so I added a shelf on top to address that issue. I'm happy with this and am happy with the price I paid on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Mendenhall

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice; horrible instructions
customer_reviews.text: The bar comes in an impossible number of small, nearly identical pieces that are not clearly identified in the assembly instructions--there are no measurements provided, nor labels on the pieces. An absolute nightmare to assemble. It's rather nice once put together though, even if it is a little more wobbly than I'd like. Good size, great drawer. The rack for stemware is worthless for bordeaux glasses, and is too small for anything other than flutes and white wine glasses.
customer_reviews.author: geodesic42

customer_reviews.title: Once I got this put together I loved it but there are a couple of things that ...
customer_reviews.text: Once I got this put together I loved it but there are a couple of things that are annoying. First, one of the parts was faulty so I had to order a new one, which was not easy, and wait for it to be shipped. Got the part and we were good to go. Then the metal racks you hang the wine glasses from will only hold really small glasses. Most of my wine glasses have to big of a stem base and they won't fit in the track so I just have most of my glasses sitting on that shelf instead of hanging. Other than that I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Guldager

customer_reviews.title: I love my mini bar !!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this piece !!! It’s classy and yet casual at the same time. I’m not ready to build a full bar yet so this is perfect for the time being. It was crazy to put it together but I did it all by myself and for that I value it even more . I will say the directions were a little tricky but other than that the packaging was very secure ! No damage whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffco418

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, looks great. Wish it had more detailed instuctions (I missed one backing plate and now would have to disasemble half the cabinet to put it on). The instructions are just very cluttered. Great item otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Rob F

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Item
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. It looks spectacular in our home. However, assembling this piece is not at all a breeze. It is time consuming to put together and the instructions are not good. I did call the company when I had a question on the assembly and their Customer Service Department was extremely helpful. This item took us about 8 hours to assemble because we had to disassemble and reassemble a couple of times because of the poor instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the effort.
customer_reviews.text: This is hard to rate. The cabinet itself is absolutely beautiful once we got it put together!! It is well worth the effort it took! However, we only received the first 2 steps of the instructions and only part of the parts list. We were able to look up the product online and downloaded the full instructions and parts list... otherwise there would have been no way to figure it out on our own as it comes in so many pieces. Like I said...it's well worth the extra effort though!
customer_reviews.author: Mariam H Sleight

customer_reviews.title: Like other reviews say
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews say, it take a while to put together - took two of us about 3 hours all said and done. However, it was well worth it. It fits perfectly in the space, looks great (have already had several people compliment us on it), all my glasses, bottles and even a few decorative items fit. Oh, and I had no issues getting all my stem glasses to hang (some reviewers had issues with this but they may not have mounted the brackets straight). Would recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get better instructions
customer_reviews.text: I would of given more stars if it wasn’t almost impossible to read the instructions. I basically had to put it together with assumption.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but assembly takes a lot of time and effort
customer_reviews.text: The assembly of this item is very involved. There are at least 200 items to insert, connect, and screw. The assembly task will take at least an hour; it took me and a friend more than two hours. Instructions are purely pictographic (no words) so you have to look very carefully to understand the proper alignment of items. That said, once the cabinet was constructed, it looked great. I'm very happy with it, overall. Yes, its veneer over particle board. But it's been manufactured well and I hope it lasts for a good year or two without too much wear. Definitely a four star for me.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W. Santana

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I had a better review. The instructions are clear, the locks are GARBAGE and to be honest, I'm afraid to even move this piece. Besides the way it looks, there isn't anything else I like about it.
customer_reviews.author: Travis O Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great little bar
customer_reviews.text: This bar looks awesome in our apartment. Boyfriend took about 45 mins to put it together and did have a little frustration but nothing major. It holds our wine glasses and wine bottles just fine and we finally have a place for our shot glasses and growlers robe displayed. Would definitely recommend for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Destinie

customer_reviews.title: I really like this. It is smaller than it seems in ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. It is smaller than it seems in photos, so just pay attention to the dimensions in the description. Perfect size for my apartment and pretty nice quality for the price. Two of the legs arrived broken, but I just went to the website listed on the instructions and asked for replacements and they sent them, no questions asked. After that, it did take a bit of time to put together, mostly because I was being extra cautious, based on others' reviews, that I was assembling everything correctly, since the instructions are a little confusing. If you can take your time, you won't have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M.

customer_reviews.title: Started rocky but good once someone knowledgeable put it together..
customer_reviews.text: My bf put this together and it looks awesome. I tried to put it together myself but it was a train wreck... I followed the instructions completely and the thing was rickety as could be. No idea what magic my bf did, but after he got it together it seems sturdy and nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It’s was time consuming to be build but loved the final product. It took my husband and I together 3 hours to built. Perfect choice to our new home.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Instructions
customer_reviews.text: I wish this would have come with better instructions, so we didn't have to take it apart a few different times. But overall, it is very sturdy and a beautiful piece! Only downfall is that not all wine glasses fit inside the rack, but it still works great!
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: It's my coffee and wine bar...
customer_reviews.text: I really only like sparkling wine so I made this my coffee bar, too. It super nice and sturdy and I was able to put it together myself but not until I read ALL the questions about putting it together which were very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette B.

customer_reviews.title: Found them via painful googling. Assembled in 2 hour with 2 people
customer_reviews.text: Arrived without assembly instructions. Found them via painful googling. Assembled in 2 hour with 2 people. Thus far looks good....like that it is not deep. downside: open areas are smaller than expected...tall items only fit on top open shelf. Update: this was assembled by a friend who is a carpenter... less than one year later is leaning and falling apart.... disassembling due to fear of it collapsing.
customer_reviews.author: Jess R

customer_reviews.title: but it looks great! Cheap solution to my bar storage needs
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to put together, but it looks great! Cheap solution to my bar storage needs.
customer_reviews.author: KBREINLI

customer_reviews.title: Live it looks so nice excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Was very concerned after reading the reviews about assembling but after you get started it is not bad to put together . It’s the getting started that is confusing .... just make sure all the unfinished sides are on the same end ...
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Good buy. and i love the red layered drawer. classy
customer_reviews.author: REVIEWER

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are pictures. It may take you a little while to put it together. Once it's together it's Sturdy and holds a lot of booze. Don't really like the glass holder, holds smaller wine glasses ... we have big ones. Would give it a 5 Star but the instructions to put it together could be better, and the wine glass holders could accommodate larger glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard E. Valentine III

customer_reviews.title: Good Product Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Takes some time to assemble but for the money it is a great product. The wine cubby spots are a bit small but still useable, I would recommend drinking one of the bottles before you start assembly.
customer_reviews.author: GreatAPG

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Its my second time purchasing this bar. The first time I had it in white and gave it to my sister when I moved. Most reviews said the instructions were difficult to read but I had no issues. Its sturdy and does the job I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Lydi

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than thought and hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very, very difficult to install. Took more than 12 hours. Either hire someone to do it or but it already assemble.
customer_reviews.author: N. Emanuel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shelf unit!!
customer_reviews.text: We are so happy with our new wine shelf. It's very pretty and sturdy. It took my husband a long time to put it together, but we took the advice of many other reviewers and spread everything out and took our time. It's biggest frustration is that the pictures should be larger, but if you don't rush, it is okay. Beautiful and functional! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: windchase

customer_reviews.title: It's way smaller in person then it looks like on the site
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok piece but to me not worth the money I spent. It's way smaller in person then it looks like on the site. Not to sturdy but overall still a nice decorative piece.
customer_reviews.author: Mzcontrolla

customer_reviews.title: Check your parts and instructions
customer_reviews.text: As big as the box is and how well packed; pieces still managed to be broken in half. Also the instructions and parts DO NOT COME LABELED. So it takes a lil bit of engineering to figure out what pieces are what and go where because theres over 15 parts to mess around with. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: tough to put together but I love it! The wine rack part is for smaller bottles.
customer_reviews.author: watertiger09

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Looks very chic!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice once assembled. I was worried it looked too short in our living room, but once you put bottles on the top shelf things balance out.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Good for 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful stand for alcohool But not easy to build alone Quality is like build it for one time and to move it to much
customer_reviews.author: Bohena

customer_reviews.title: the directions were horrible. And I've put together a lot of furniture ...
customer_reviews.text: As others said...the directions were horrible. And I've put together a lot of furniture before. This was by far the worst. Too bad the company doesn't fix this. Otherwise, the piece looks very sharp and I love it. Only wish it were a bit wider and it would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Frank the Tank

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble but looks wonderful once assembled.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son and his fiance (now wife) and their stock the bar shower. They had a time getting it assembled. It took 2 tries and 9 people to get it together. Need patience but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this piece. Great looking and hold a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua  Buckley

customer_reviews.title: but it is sturdy and looks great in my kitchen next to my ...
customer_reviews.text: Its not real wood, but it is sturdy and looks great in my kitchen next to my bar table. If you have a small area but need a bar, this will work!
customer_reviews.author: cesilia

customer_reviews.title: I recommend good organization in the beginning and a 2nd person ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a bear to put together because there are so many parts. I recommend good organization in the beginning and a 2nd person to help. Once it is together, you will be so happy. They only thing that could make it any nicer would be if it were a foot taller..but not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Martha I. Young

customer_reviews.title: Directions were very hard to follow-plus more
customer_reviews.text: The directions were very hard to follow. After putting the item together I found out I needed additional parts. I followed the instructions on what you needed to do to get missing parts. I sent an e-mail, no response. I faxed them, no response. I called leaving messages, no response. I called a different number, leaving a message, no response. I e-mailed someone in a different department that I found on line and after telling them everything I went through and telling them that: " now that you have my money you don't care about me, I got a response. This was after three weeks. Make that a half of star. Thank You!! nice looking wine rack, though.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E. Shambaugh

customer_reviews.title: Assembly nightmare, glasses don't fit!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: looks good once assembled, color is nice Cons: took 6 total hours to assemble, none of the wine glasses fit, some bottles don't fit either, it's not wood but cheap board with wood finish, had I known this, I wouldn't have wasted money on it
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Valerio

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for the money. Arrived late but worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Modern, fits everywhere, looks amazing. Igot complements all the time.
customer_reviews.text: Another excellent product that I got from AMAZON. I got this bar ladder a year ago and looks incredible in a corner of my living room. I recommend this product to anyone specially if you have a small place. This bar ladder will give a dramatic and modern view to your place. Good price. Easy to take care. Modern and looks fancy.
customer_reviews.author: Nasri714

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of furniture for the price. Assembly was a bit confusing but doable with a little common sense. People complaining about quality need to consider the price compared to nicer pieces of furniture. Comparable looking pieces of furniture can go for 800+. It is smaller then I expected, and if I started over I would have made adjustments or removed one shelf because the shelfs don't fit regular sized bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: It Looks pretty nice and holds plenty of stuff
customer_reviews.text: It Looks pretty nice and holds plenty of stuff. Pay very close attention when putting it together and get help it is a two person operation. The instructions are not as clear as they could be but if you pay attention it does go together and looks great
customer_reviews.author: Road Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Piece
customer_reviews.text: I Love this piece. Contrary to other reviews, I found it very easy to put together if you follow the directions. I do suggest you use a stubby phillips screwdriver. There are some tight places. Perfect for what I needed. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Vickster

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to put together
customer_reviews.text: Terrible to put together! Took my husband and a friend hours! Would not order again!
customer_reviews.author: Nev

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece. It has a bunch of pieces, but it is not that hard to put together. If you separate the pieces by number you should be fine. The instructions are by picture only. But remember when putting it together, the pictures are showing you the front of the unit. Just an FYI. It stands about 5" tall but is just fine for me. P.S. all the pieces are numbered on the edges.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are picture based and can be a bit confusing to follow but overall it's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Julie

customer_reviews.title: Horrible to set up
customer_reviews.text: Parts are horrible, the instruction for this is nothing but very small pictures. Gave up trying to set it up, just didn't look like it would hold anything. the material just sucks. My advice, keep searching
customer_reviews.author: Fernando M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Our stemware didn't fit. The wine rack only fits narrow wine bottles (no wider-based bottles you typically find with Pinot noir and many white wines). Just impractical overall. Wish we'd returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis D. Gee

customer_reviews.title: Terrible instructions
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a product of very good quality....I’m hoping so. I can’t say right now because the instructions are absolutely horrendous. My goal for 2019 is to eventually get this thing put together.....
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece of furniture! I get a lot of compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this bar
customer_reviews.text: This was such a pain to put together, but the finished product is amazing! I have received so many compliments on this bar
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic without leaving a huge footprint
customer_reviews.text: Very solidly built piece. Looks fantastic without leaving a huge footprint. Just be warned that if your wine glasses have a broad base they wont git on the hanging rack, but theres plenty of other shelf space. I really really like this piece, great value.
customer_reviews.author: A.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: Great cabinet. Looks very nice and good quality. Took my husband 2 hours to assemble. Sturdy construction. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Look at instructions carefully when assembling it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my living room and I absolutely love it, its very modern and fancy! The only reason why I didn't give 5 stars is due to the assembly instructions are a bit confusing, even though the pieces are numbered! Other than that is really good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: claudia lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for what I needed. I wanted something to go in this area. It is a great size for what I wanted. It's not too big or small. I love it. Only issue I have is the wine glasses dont fit. That may be because I have bigger glasses but I dont know.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Webb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Just got this item about 3 hours before this post. This product exceeded my expectations! Very good quality structure.Was delivered way before stated without a scratch on it. It was heavily wrapped in bubble wrap so damage to the box was nearly impossible. Everything fit together perfectly with no missing parts. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the instructions were very difficult to understand.Other then that I'm very happy with this purchase. The only thing I need to mention is that your bigger base wine glasses won't fit in the rack. Can't go wrong for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Gagnon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: You have to take your time when assembling. The instructions are more woman-friendly than man-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The finished product was as expected and a good size for space needed
customer_reviews.text: The finished product was as expected and a good size for space needed. However, warning on the very hard to follow instructions. If Amazon and others had any pull, this company ought to be encouraged to update and make their instructions clearer. Pictures okay, but they were nowhere detailed enough and took a lot of trial and error.
customer_reviews.author: James D.

customer_reviews.title: Love the way it looks and wasn't to difficult to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it looks and wasn't to difficult to put together. Instructions similar to ikea instructions. Be sure to review each step fully before beginning the step. I personally jumped the fun on the last step and made an error anchoring the wine holders in the bottom portion. Everything else looks great. Very happy with this piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: The directions are ridiculous. Pieces aren't numbered and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: The directions are ridiculous. Pieces aren't numbered and it's confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Tzelazo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: little confusing to setup with the instructions. once you get going the final product was great
customer_reviews.author: NIckgd1

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh it’s okag
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed my wine glasses don’t fit on the rack (kinda the only reason I got this)
customer_reviews.author: Reagan  Heller

customer_reviews.title: Everything needed in a mini bar, but fits in a small space
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a mini bar to go in our entertainment room, but it was hard to find something that didn't take up too much space. It's nice that this is able to hold such a variety of drink items: glasses (wine, shot, martini, pint, etc.), alcohol (wine bottles, booze, etc.), and accessories (bottle openers, stir sticks, napkins, etc.). Additionally, there is still a space for you to actually mix your drink. It's everything we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and functional
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Super nice addition to our recently built bar. Very sturdy with lots of room
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: It is essentially an overly priced ikea bar. It’s made of particle board and rather flimsy. I would not reccomend for half of the price.
customer_reviews.author: elijah kane neal

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to our lounge area.
customer_reviews.text: This unit went together pretty well considering all the pieces and parts etc. I like the way it looks behind our bar as extra storage for wine, glasses and alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: PattyRhee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Dont let other peoples reviews stop you from buying this! The instructions are a little difficult but overall for the price you pay for this u cant beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy berumen

customer_reviews.title: Poor instructions, nice starter bar
customer_reviews.text: The cam locks are very flimsy, and the instructions were very vague. The quality could be better, but we were satisfied with the end results.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled by the pictures. Not worth the good price.
customer_reviews.text: Feels cheap and the directions for assembly we not user friendly and were very obviously copies of a copy that were sloppily stapled.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Pease

customer_reviews.title: Looks large but isn’t. measure your space
customer_reviews.text: Definitely smaller then the photo portrays but still good quality for the price and looks good in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Not too difficult to assemble. Perfect size for the small space I needed it in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plan on a lengthy assembly time...
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are horrible and some pieces were marked incorrectly. I put it together by myself and it took hours. I almost gave up on it but glad I finished because it looks nice once it is done. I felt like I needed a drink by the time I got to the end!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice though.
customer_reviews.text: It was a pain to put together and the metal pieces where the glasses slide in aren't large enough to fit some of my wine glasses (the base of the stem doesnt fit in the slider part of the upside down holder). Looks nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Stoltz

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: The wine case is exactly as shown. Looks great in the space Ive placeed it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is small and the glass should of been in the the middle shelf.
customer_reviews.text: It is nice but l am very disappointed The high not tell for the course of it. is not worth the money l payed for it.
customer_reviews.author: Diella Powell

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Recieved items the stand legs were broken very nice.. just wished it was broken.
customer_reviews.author: JusPeachy

customer_reviews.title: Too long putting together
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst putting together, read the reviews. Its still sitting in my garage, I have to keep going back. Some pieces do not fit, too many parts and the directions are terrible. I'm sure once it is put together it will do. So far it is not a strong piece of furniture
customer_reviews.author: LISA R

customer_reviews.title: The wood is flimsy and I ended up breaking more pieces than I would've liked in the assembly process
customer_reviews.text: If you buy this, don't put it together yourself. The wood is flimsy and I ended up breaking more pieces than I would've liked in the assembly process. Not typical of me. You get what you pay for I suppose...
customer_reviews.author: Sean Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to put together but smaller then I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Shanzy924

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece once it's together
customer_reviews.text: I love it, but I will say it took my husband and I 6hrs to put it together!
customer_reviews.author: xoxo

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: Worst instructions ever. Do not buy. It will fall apart when. You are almost done. I give 0 stars!!!!! Customer service was not even English speaker!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette

customer_reviews.title: Assembly instructions Sucks
customer_reviews.text: The instructions sucked took us about 6 hours to assemble but we are not the best at putting things together. The overall outcome was great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my living room. Looks great, have gotten compliments left and right!
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: It's a good purchase. The only wierd thing is the size ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good purchase. The only wierd thing is the size of top 2 shelves. It way too small. No bottles fot in. I opted not to put together the top shelf.
customer_reviews.author: AAA

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice piece of furniture, its kind of small but its still ok, you can fit a lot of stuff , its nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, not easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the overall look of this, its a beautiful piece of furniture... unforunately all tall bottles have to go to the top shelf as they wont fit anything larger than a pint. Also, the actual assembly was difficult. But I'm really happy I did purchase it.. after getting it together it looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: JKas316

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it’s perfect! Lots of storage for wine and glasses
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to build on your own as it is very heavy. Otherwise it’s perfect! Lots of storage for wine and glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor instructions
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in damaged packaging. Predrilled holes dont all align correctly. Instructions for assembly are a joke...almost non existent.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Rader

product_meta.title: Monarch Specialties , Home Bar, Ladder Style, Cappuccino, 60"H
product_meta.description: This stylish and contemporary ladder style home bar encompasses a design that is ideal for entertaining your guests. It features a felt lined drawer accented with a silver metal drawer pull, a place to hang up to 12 small wine glasses, shelf space ideal for making cocktails, and a wine rack that can store up to 15 standard wine bottles. This cappuccino finished home bar is practical, elegant and a must-have in every home!
feature_bullets: Suspended stem glass holder with wide openings for stems
Bottle storage for up to 15 bottles
Hang up to 8 wine glasses. WEIGHT CAPACITY: 150 lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars253 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
